topic.title: John McAfee found dead of apparent suicide in Spanish jail
topic.body:
https://twitter.com/officialmcafee/status/1316801215083225096?s=20
"I am content in here. I have friends.

The food is good. All is well.

Know that if I hang myself, a la Epstein, it will be no fault of mine." -John McAffe

https://www.instagram.com/p/CQecC-TnyER/?hl=en

He did say he had a deadman switch so keep your eyes peeled for it.
